thread.title: The Live-Action 'Beauty And The Beast' Is Even Better With Eddie Murphy
thread.title_full: The Live-Action 'Beauty And The Beast' Is Even Better With Eddie Murphy

author: Ron Dicker
title: The Live-Action 'Beauty And The Beast' Is Even Better With Eddie Murphy
text:
The Live-Action 'Beauty And The Beast' Is Even Better With Eddie Murphy Be our guest, Eddie. By Ron Dicker 
The “Beverly Hills Cop” himself is on the case of the upcoming live-action “ Beauty and the Beast ,” set for release March 17. 
Watch Eddie Murphy and his many characters invade a trailer for the Disney screen musical, courtesy of YouTube user Aldo Jones. 
We like the chemistry in “Eddie and the Beast,” but perhaps the new cast member should be reminded that it isn’t polite to point.
